display_name: [The Outcome of Repeated Tragedy] Super Saiyan Bardock

kit.leader_skill: "Time Travelers" Category Ki +2 and HP, ATK & DEF +50%

super_attack.name: Furious Bites
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK; Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Lowers ATK

passive_skill.name: Care for Comrades
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when another 4 or more Super Class allies are on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack for 4 turn(s); (Once) ATK & DEF 100% up; (Once) Super Class allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 20% up; (Once) Medium chance of performing a critical hit; (Once) "Time Travelers" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 20% up; When there is a "Wicked Bloodline" Category enemy: ATK 100% up; When all allies attacking in the same turn are Super Class characters: Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 50% up; When HP is 50% or less: ATK & chance of performing a critical hit 50% up
